games.title: Space Impact
games.first_impression: Who don't know this legendary game?
games.quote: "One of the Greatest Games of ALL Time" - CNET
games.available_platforms:
Mobile phone
J2ME, Symbian S60
N-Gage Classic/QD
N-Gage 2.0

games.title: World Championship Snooker 2003
games.first_impression: My first PS2 game, very needed to kill time back then
games.quote: "WCS2003 may not look as good as it could do, but it's got lots to do, with an unlockable John Virgo trickshot challenge, which is ace" -Eurogamer

games.title: Crash Tag Team Racing
games.first_impression: Press rectangle or square in loading screen
games.quote: "The racing isn't exactly the star of the show, but Crash Tag Team Racing's supplemental elements pull the whole thing together into a unique and most enjoyable experience" -GameSpot

games.title: Samurai Warriors 2
games.first_impression: Japanese hack and slash game that makes me interested on learning Japan's History
games.quote: "Return to feudal Japan for more of the same button-mashing mayhem that Koei's been serving up for years." -GameSpot

games.title: Midnight Club 3: DUB Edition Remix
games.first_impression: Interesting racing game with branded cars with powerful special ability
games.quote: "More than just a remake, Remix digs up new songs, cars and a level from MC2." -IGN

games.title: Ninja Saga
games.first_impression: This game enhanced my social skills to a whole new level
games.quote:
"Great intro. Customizable avatar. Combat is fun for a little while.
" -Gamezebo
games.available_platforms:
Facebook, with Adobe Flash Player
Android
iOS

games.title: MX Unleashed
games.first_impression: A very good off-road racing game with unique vehicles and memorable soundtracks
games.quote: "More fun than the real thing, and you won't die trying." -IGN

games.title: Dynasty Warriors: Gundam 2
games.first_impression: Gundam Multiverse in a single game
games.quote: "Can giant robots revitalize the Dynasty Warriors series?" - IGN

games.title: Persona 4
games.first_impression: Memories of this game will remain in my heart, forever
games.genres:
Japanese Role-playing Game
Social Simulation Game
games.quote: "This stylish role-playing social-simulation game packs a great story, realistic characters, and dozens of hours of enjoyment." -GameSpot

games.title: Persona 3 FES
games.genres:
Japanese Role-playing Game
Social Simulation Game
games.quote: "This is the definitive version of 2007's best role-playing game." -GameSpot

games.title: Digimon Masters Online
games.quote: "Welcome to the world of Digimon Masters Online." -MMOs.com

games.title: Dota 2
games.quote: "Dota 2 is complicated, exhausting, and sometimes cruel, but its many complexities form an incredibly satisfying and exciting multiplayer game" -GameSpot

games.title: Sid Meier's Civilization VI
games.first_impression: Can you build a civilization, that can stand the test of time?
games.quote: "Discovering, decoding, and developing a living world in the best Civilization yet." -PC Gamer
games.available_platforms:
Microsoft Windows
macOS
Linux
iOS
Nintendo Switch
PlayStation 4
Xbox One

games.title: Persona 5
games.first_impression: The next level of persona franchise!
games.genres:
Japanese Role-playing Game
Social Simulation Game
games.quote: "A unique and immersive experience that will leave any JRPG fan speechless." -GameSpot

games.title: Genshin Impact
games.first_impression: The hype of this game pull myself up
games.quote: "An incredible open world and addictive exploration made for amazing adventure" -IGN
